item.description:
Green Bag Lunch Series
An Easy Way to Get Green!

Friday March 20, Noon-1pm
Sierra Club Office
10 Milk Street #632, Boston

What's the State's Plan for our Ocean?
This month, our speaker will be Matt Boger of Mass Ocean Action.

Join us for our "Green Bag Lunch", our series of get-togethers on Friday afternoons. Each month features a different environmental topic and offer a way to get involved and make a difference. Bring your own lunch and beverage. We'll spend the first 15 minutes socializing, about 20 minutes hearing about the process, and the rest of the time working on specific action. Sponsored by the Sierra Club's Greater Boston Group.

This is a free event and open to all. For more information: Mary Ann Nelson 617-442-0123 or manelsonnew@gmail.com.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bag Lunch - this Friday at noon
